trans-unit.source: Please enter display name, this will be automatically populated
Describe what is the community about
Paste the npub and press enter ‚èé
This note is awaiting moderator approval
Media is not shown as per your preferences. Click the above image to see it. You can change this from preferences.
I'm zapddit, a topic-based nostr browser. Here, you follow topics, not people.
Travel with me, answering a few questions, while I set you up to enjoy the #zapdditexperience üöÄ
Click on the button below to copy your private key. Keep it in a safe place. Don't share this with anyone.
This is the key to access your nostr account across all clients.
Give yourself a cool name here...
This is how people will refer to you on the nostr ecosystem
Select those that closely resemble you üëá
I wish to start my day with a daily dose of nostr ‚òï
I am a big news bug üì∞
I am an ardent Bitcoin nerd ü§ì
I need the hot goss about nostr clients üßë‚Äçüíª
Choose the ones that gravely annoy you
Once you click Finish, I will auto-follow the suggested topics below and auto-mute the topics listed at the end.
Don't worry! If you already have a zapddit setup, I won't mess it up. I won't unfollow or unmute any topic that you already followed or muted.
You can see the people you follow here üëá
Not following anyone yet. May be try following some people?
npub of the person who will receive the sats for your downzaps
Hide non-zap options for upvote and downvote
Enable this option to hide non-zap upvote and downvotes for notes and comments.
These many sats will be sent when you zap
Never mind about moderator approvals. Show all notes.
Set Communities Feed as your default feed
Enable this option to see Communities by default when you go to 'My Feed' page.
Any post with this tag will not be shown by zapddit to you
Enable this option to show media only from people you follow.
You are not logged in using your private key. May be you have logged in using the NIP-07 extension or your public key.
websocket url of the new relay
Enter your new avatar url here...
Enter your LUD16 lightning address here...
Looks like you haven't muted anyone yet.
Scan this QR using your Lightning Wallet app
You have not created any community so far.
Secure login to zapddit requires a NIP-07 extension to work. Don't have a NIP-07 extension? Refer
Key starting with nsec(for read+write) or npub(read-only)
Zapddit runs on top of nostr. Click the button below to create a new user on the nostr ecosystem.
You can use the same account in all the nostr clients.
Not ready to use a nostr account yet?
You can have a clean lurker experience using this option.
All your settings are saved within browser's local storage and cleared when you logout.
